sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Grommet, Box, Heading, Paragraph, Button, Image } from 'grommet'; import { Github, Domain } from 'grommet-icons'; import AppBar from './AppBar.js'; import Footer from './Footer.js'; const theme = { global: { colors: { brand: '#116466', }, font: { family: 'Roboto', size: '18px', height: '20px', }, }, }; function Portfolio() { return ( Portfolio Portfolio Web Application
